snippet: The Bears, the last of the eight original members of the American Hockey League and one of its highest-drawing teams, will celebrate their 75th year in the league.
abstract: The Hershey Bears, last of eight original members of American Hockey League and one of its highest-drawing teams, will celebrate their 75th year in the league.
lead_paragraph: The Bears, the last of the eight original members of the American Hockey League and one of its highest-drawing teams, will celebrate their 75th year in the league.

headline.seo: The Hershey Bears, an Original A.H.L. Member, Celebrate 75 Years in the League
headline.main: In Hershey, an Original A.H.L. Team Plays On Uninterrupted
headline.print_headline: In Hershey, an Original A.H.L. Team Plays On Uninterrupted
